Articles.Content: Duno if anyone else here plays with pandora running.I'M sure there's a few.So i tabbed out of ksp to check pandora.....and iron man jumps outa nowhere and broke my player?!?!?!i was totally like dude i hopes u gona pay for that man!!!!! it totally fit the room together man!!!!lol.So fair warning to other pandora users, he is out there!Just beacareful! ~the dude abides!
